price: A zar on ne zna da će, kada kaburovi budu prevrnuti s onim što je u njima,
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
